Detailed Description

template<class STRING_TYPE = string, uint32_t BUCKET_SIZE = 8192, uint8_t SPLIT_RATIO = 75, typename STRING_TYPE::value_type * ALPHABET = a2z, uint32_t ALPHABET_SIZE = a2z_size>
class Bucket< STRING_TYPE, BUCKET_SIZE, SPLIT_RATIO, ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE >

B-trie has two typess of nodes, alphabet node and bucket. Bucket stores string and value pair in increasing sequencial order.
